1: לַ֝מְנַצֵּ֗חַ <sup>5329 </sup> <n>To the chief Musician</n> לְדָוִ֥ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>[A Psalm] of David</n> לְהַזְכִּֽיר׃ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>to bring to remembrance</n> אֱלֹהִ֥ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>[Make haste] O God</n> לְהַצִּילֵ֑נִי <sup>5337 </sup> <n>to deliver</n> יְ֝הוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>me O LORD</n> לְעֶזְרָ֥תִי <sup>5833 </sup> <n>to help</n> חֽוּשָֽׁה׃ <sup>2363 </sup> <n>me make haste</n>
2: יֵבֹ֣שׁוּ <sup>954 </sup> <n>Let them be ashamed</n> וְיַחְפְּרוּ֮ <sup>2659 </sup> <n>and confounded</n> מְבַקְשֵׁ֪י <sup>1245 </sup> <n>that seek</n> נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <sup>5315 </sup> <n>after my soul</n> יִסֹּ֣גוּ <sup>5472 </sup> <n>let them be turned</n> אָ֭חוֹר <sup>268 </sup> <n>backward</n> וְיִכָּלְמ֑וּ <sup>3637 </sup> <n>and put to confusion</n> חֲ֝פֵצֵ֗י <sup>2655 </sup> <n>that desire</n> רָעָתִֽי׃ <sup>7451 </sup> <n>my hurt</n>
3: יָ֭שׁוּבוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>Let them be turned back</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>for</n> עֵ֣קֶב <sup>6118 </sup> <n>for a reward</n> בָּשְׁתָּ֑ם <sup>1322 </sup> <n>of their shame</n> הָ֝אֹמְרִ֗ים <sup>559 </sup> <n>that say</n> הֶ֘אָ֥ח ׀ <sup>1889 </sup> <n>Aha</n> הֶאָֽח׃ <sup>1889 </sup> <n>aha</n>
4: יָ֘שִׂ֤ישׂוּ <sup>7797 </sup> <n>thee rejoice</n> וְיִשְׂמְח֨וּ ׀ <sup>8055 </sup> <n>and be glad</n> בְּךָ֗ כָּֽל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מְבַ֫קְשֶׁ֥יךָ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>Let all those that seek</n> וְיֹאמְר֣וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>say</n> תָ֭מִיד <sup>8548 </sup> <n>continually</n> יִגְדַּ֣ל <sup>1431 </sup> <n>be magnified</n> אֱלֹהִ֑ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>Let God</n> אֹ֝הֲבֵ֗י <sup>157 </sup> <n>in thee and let such as love</n> יְשׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <sup>3444 </sup> <n>thy salvation</n>
5: וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> עָנִ֣י <sup>6041 </sup> <n>But I [am] poor</n> וְאֶבְיוֹן֮ <sup>34 </sup> <n>and needy</n> אֱלֹהִ֪ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>unto me O God</n> חֽוּשָׁ֫ה־ <sup>2363 </sup> <n>make haste</n> לִּ֥י עֶזְרִ֣י <sup>5828 </sup> <n>thou [art] my help</n> וּמְפַלְטִ֣י <sup>6403 </sup> <n>and my deliverer</n> אַ֑תָּה <sup>859 </sup> <n>O</n> יְ֝הוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תְּאַחַֽר׃ <sup>309 </sup> <n>make no tarrying</n>
